verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] making preparations to warehouse migrant children on military bases , according to Defense Department communications .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: making] [ARG1: preparations to warehouse migrant children on military bases] , [ARGM-ADV: according to Defense Department communications] .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] is making preparations to [V: warehouse] [ARG1: migrant children] [ARGM-LOC: on military bases] , according to Defense Department communications .
The Trump administration is making preparations to warehouse migrant children on military bases , [V: according] to Defense Department communications .
